page.title: 09FORD HOME LIFE EVENING
page.content:
THIS IS A TYPICAL SUNDAY EVENING.
At 6-00pm my sister,Anna, and I go to church.Then Mum and Dad go at 6-15.The service lasts for an hour then we have a choir practice.At 8pm we go to the{CROSS GATES}pub for supper.Then we go home to bed.
A TYPICAL WEEKDAY EVENING.
I arrive home at about 7.15pm from school as we have 'prep' (homework) until 6.45pm.As I am usually tired by this time I will usually watch the television.After a small supper I go up to bed. I may read for a while, but I am usually asleep by 10pm.
